history.content:
from Berkeley grad Chris McCoy:

Students,

 

We know that not all internship opportunities go our way.  Same is true for employers.  Never giving up amidst challenges are traits we look for in our candidates.  Thus, I’m reaching out with a second chance to see if any of you folks in the Berkeley EECS community are available to help us accelerate our transition to sustainable energy THIS Spring 2022.

 

As a former Berkeley alum (Mechanical Engineering), I lead a small but mission-critical team that builds prototype vehicles for Tesla.   We’re still looking for highly-qualified intern candidates for Spring 2022 who will be responsible for hands-on FW development on both vehicle prototypes and customer-facing product features.   

 

IF you still have full-time availability AND can work both on-site and remotely (Fremont / Sunnyvale), please shoot me a direct e-mail with your résumé at cmccoy@tesla.com and I’ll send a job description your way.

 

Thank you and Go Bears!

~CDM
history.subject: Tesla internship
